subject: One time setup to run testcases
msgSnippet: hi, I am using ant-junit-1.6.5.jar, which comes with maven 1.1-beta-1. The problem is, testcase method requires to start/stop the server for running testcases,
messageBody:
hi,
I am using ant-junit-1.6.5.jar, which comes with maven 1.1-beta-1.
The problem is, testcase method requires to start/stop the server for
running testcases, which takes lots of time to complete all testcases.

Testcases can be run by starting the server once for all Testcase file
and stop the server when all testcase finish.
Which i couldnt figure out how to setup the server for all test cases.

Couldnt use TestSuite, it generates one report for all testcase file.

Please do reply with your suggestions

Thanks in advance

regards
pawan
